pages.text: Celestial lanterns are lighting implements with strange properties. The presence of these lanterns wards off Celestial Towers.$(br2)Having one nearby will ward off towers by 25%, two make 50%, and a third will prevent spawns entirely. It's a good idea to put these near bases to keep towers out of the way.
The Celestial Fragment ingredient is an exclusive drop from towers, meaning you'll have to destroy some first.
